# This is executed last among all history
BUILDINGS={
	c:USA = {
		every_scope_state = {
			effect_starting_buildings_state_university = yes
		}
	}
	every_country = {
			limit = { NOT = { OR = { c:NRK ?= this c:PRC ?= this c:IDA ?= this c:TRK ?= this c:DRC ?= this c:FRA ?= this c:USA ?= this c:GBR ?= this c:GER ?= this c:JPN ?= this c:AUZ ?= this c:NZL ?= this c:STL ?= this c:CAN ?= this c:PAK ?= this c:BNG >= this c:ROC ?= this } } } #xme = mexico iii = indonesia
		every_scope_state = { limit = { state_has_sufficient_population = yes state_population < 700000  }
			effect_starting_buildings_0 = yes
			effect_prune_excess_buildings = yes
		}
	}
	every_country = {
			limit = { NOT = { OR = { c:NRK ?= this c:PRC ?= this c:IDA ?= this c:TRK ?= this c:DRC ?= this c:FRA ?= this c:USA ?= this c:GBR ?= this c:GER ?= this c:JPN ?= this c:AUZ ?= this c:NZL ?= this c:STL ?= this c:CAN ?= this c:PAK ?= this c:BNG >= this c:ROC ?= this } } } #xme = mexico iii = indonesia

			effect_starting_buildings_1 = yes
			effect_prune_excess_buildings = yes
		}
	}
